actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to authorize the hiring of senior citizens as price control wardens to enforce price and wage control regulations.

summary.text: Authorizes necessary funds for fiscal year 1974 to hire senior citizens (65 years of age or older) as price control wardens to enforce price and wage control regulations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to authorize the hiring of senior citizens as price control wardens to enforce price and wage control regulations.
